page.title: 09Coleshill church tower.
page.content: The tower door was open,through it was the long steep climb up to the spire. The steep steps spiralled upwards. Thefront of the steps were worn slightly away where many feet had trodden.{Ninety seven steps!}Near to the top it was cold,dark and scary. In some places there were no lights or handrail.The spiralling and darkness caused dizziness.At the top.Miles around Coleshill could be seen,new and old Coleshill,{Hams Hall power station ,the motorway and countryside.Many noises could be heard,industrial machinery,bangs,crashes and motor vehicles.Engraved in the stone was 1865,CHC 1903 and Woldfield 1880. Most of the sandstone is black and decayed were two pillars were restored .The counter balance for the{cockerel}could be seen inside the spire.Coleshill had changed but the church had not.
